title: Store Order Fulfillment Reports
content:
• Home
  • ››Manhattan Active® Omni
  • ››Supply Chain Intelligence
  • ››Supply Chain Intelligence - Omni
  • ››Reports
  • ››Store Order Fulfillment Reports

Store Order Fulfillment Reports

  • Overview
  • SLA Curbside Summary Report
  • SLA Curbside Metrics By Day
  • Stuck Orders

Overview

The Order Fulfillment reports include the curbside SLA and Stuck orders reports. Using these reports, managers can monitor the success of the curbside pickup service, which allows customers to place orders online and pick them up in a designated area near the store. This service has gained popularity in recent times due to its contact-less offering. These reports help managers evaluate the overall curbside performance of multiple stores and take measures to reduce the wait time for processing orders. These reports also help monitor orders with dormant statuses and the remaining days until the due date. You can access the Order Fulfillment reports in IBM Cognos by navigating to Team Content > SCI Packaged Content > Reports > OMNI > Store Order Fulfillment. 

SLA Curbside Summary Report

This report provides a bird's-eye view of stores' curbside performance, based on the following key metrics:

  • The number of orders processed
  • The average customer curbside wait time
  • The maximum curbside wait time
  • The minimum curbside wait time
  • The number and percent of orders which use the 'On the way' feature 

Retailers can run the report for multiple stores. 

Query Subject

  •  Order Fulfillment

Filters

  •  Internal Filter to select records where Delivery Method SubType = Curbside and Pickup Arrival Date Time is Not Null
  •  Multi-Select filter for Store, Fulfillment, Ship from Location 
  • Date range filter for Pick Up Arrival Date. Fulfillment, Pickup Arrival Date Time

 

Report Columns

Report Column Query Subject / Query Subject Item Calculations
Store LOCATION / DISPLAY_ID Joins from the Ship From Location on Fulfillment query subject. 
Orders Processed FULFILLMENT_LINE / ORDER_ID Count distinct Order ID, from Fulfillment Line
On The Way Utilized Count FUL_FULFILLMENT / IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY COUNT Distinct ORDER_ID where IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY = 1, Y, Yes
Percent of Orders Utilizing On The Way FUL_FULFILLMENT, FUL_FILLMENT_LINE / IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY
ORDER_ID		 1. COUNT Distinct ORDER_ID where IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY = 1, Y, Yes
2. ORDER_ID from Step 1 / COUNT Distinct ORDER_id * 100
Average Wait time FUL_FULFILLMENT, FULFILLMENT_AUDIT / PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME, PICKED_UP_DATE PICKED_UP_DATE - PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME = Wait Time
For all records, SUM Wait Time / SUM Count Distinct ORDER_ID
Minimum Wait Time FUL_FULFILLMENT,  FULFILLMENT_AUDIT / PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME, PICKED_UP_DATE For all orders, identify the lowest wait time
Maximum Wait Time FUL_FULFILLMENT, FULFILLMENT_AUDIT / PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME , PICKED_UP_DATE For all orders, identify the largest wait time
All Store Totals Provides the Average Wait Time for all stores included. Identifies the Minimum and Maximum Wait times across all the stores.   

 

Report Prompt

 

Report Output

 

SLA Curbside Metrics By Day

This report provides the key metrics at a day-level. This report also includes the count and percent of orders using the 'On the way' feature. If multiple stores are selected, one page per store is provided. 

Query Subject

  • Order Fulfillment

Filters

  •  Internal Filter to select records where Delivery Method SubType = Curbside and Pickup Arrival Date Time is Not Null
  •  Multi-Select filter for Store, Fulfillment, Ship from Location 
  • Date range filter for Pick Up Arrival Date. Fulfillment, Pickup Arrival Date Time

 

Report Columns

Report Column Query Subject / Query Subject Item Calculations
Store LOCATION / DISPLAY_ID Display ID from the Location query subject. Joins from the Ship From Location on Fulfillment query subject. 
Pickup Arrival Date Time FUFLILLMENT / PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME Displays only date portion
Orders Processed FULFILLMENT_LINE / ORDER_ID Count distinct Order ID, from Fulfillment Line
Average Wait time On / PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME Total Wait Time / Total Orders * 100. Wait Time = Picked Up Date - Pickup Arrival Date Time. Pickup Arrival Date Time from Fulfillment. Picked Up Date from Fulfillment Audit
On The Way Utilized Count FUL_FULFILLMENT / IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY COUNT Distinct ORDER_ID where IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY = 1, Y, Yes
Percent of Orders Utilizing On The Way FUL_FULFILLMENT, FUL_FILLMENT_LINE / IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY, ORDER_ID 1. COUNT Distinct ORDER_ID where IS_CUSTOMER_ON_THE_WAY = 1, Y, Yes
2. ORDER_ID from Step 1 / COUNT Distinct ORDER_id * 100
Minimum Wait Time FUL_FULFILLMENT, FULFILLMENT_AUDIT / PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME, PICKED_UP_DATE For all orders, identify the lowest wait time
Maximum Wait Time FUL_FULFILLMENT, FULFILLMENT_AUDIT / PICKUP_ARRIVAL_DATE_TIME, PICKED_UP_DATE For all orders, identify the largest wait time
Totals for All Days Provides the Average Wait Time for all stores included. Identifies the Minimum and Maximum Wait times across all days for 1 store.   

 

Report Prompt

 

Report Ouput

 

Stuck Orders

This report helps in monitoring impending issues, due to which the orders have not moved, and their statuses have not changed.

Filters

  • Fufillment Store
  • Fufillment Min Status
  • Fufillment Max Status 
  • Staging Location
  • Hours Inactive
  • Due Date

 

Report Column

Report Column Query Subject Query Subject Item Calculations
Fufillment Store Fulfillment Fulfillment Ship From Loc  
Fulfillment Line Store Department  Fulfillment Line Fufill Line Store Dept  
Fulfillment ID Fulfillment Fulfillment ID  
Fulfillment Line ID Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line ID  
Fulfillment Line Item Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line ID  
Fulfillment Line Status Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line Status case [Order Fulfillment].[Fulfillment Line].[Fulfill Line Status] when 1000.000 then 'Created'
When 2000.000, then 'Accepted'
When 3000.000, then 'Picked'
When 3300.000, then 'Sorted'
When 3500.000, then 'In Packing'
When 4000.000, then 'Packed'
When 4500.000, then 'Partially Shipped'
When 5000.000, then 'Shipped'
When 6000.000, then 'Picked Up'
When 9000.000, then 'Cancelled'
else 'Not Available' end
Fulfillment Line Order Quantity Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line Order Qty  
Fulfillment Line Pick Quantity Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line Pick Qty  
Fulfillment Line Sort Quantity Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line Sort Qty  
Fulfillment Line Pack Quantity Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line Pack Qty  
Staging Location Staging Loc for Details Detail Staging Loc  
Assigned Employee Task Task Assigned To  
Hours Inactive Fulfillment Line Fulfill Line Updated Timestamp _hours_between(current_timestamp,[Order Fulfillment].[Fulfillment Line].[Fulfill Line Updated Timestamp])
Days until Due Date Fulfillment Fulfillment Shipping Due Date _days_between (current_date,[Order Fulfillment].[Fulfillment].[Fulfillment Shipping Due Date])

 

Report Prompt and Output Page
